query: How many members are associated with majors related to the Technology industry?

member.member_id: description: column_description=unique id of member; value_description=NULL dtype=object e.g. recQaxyXBQG5BBtD0; recf4UKTfipCzgcSA; recjHj4BS5A541n9v; rec75vvFxgYtHmqxY; recUdRhbhcEO1Hk5r; rec4BLdZHS2Blfp4v
member.first_name: description: column_description=member's first name; value_description=NULL dtype=object e.g. Sherri; Edwardo; Matthew; Annabella; Adela; Keith
member.last_name: description: column_description=member's last name; value_description=commonsense evidence:  full name is first_name + last_name. e.g. A member's first name is Angela and last name is Sanders. Thus, his/her full name is Angela Sanders. dtype=object e.g. Sanders; Jacobs; Nielson; Mckee; Hewitt; Ratcliffe
member.email: description: column_description=member's email; value_description=NULL dtype=object e.g. casey.mason@lpu.edu; matt.snay@lpu.edu; katy.balentine@lpu.edu; annabella.warren@lpu.edu; keith.dunlap@lpu.edu; phillip.cullen@lpu.edu
member.position: description: column_description=The position the member holds in the club; value_description=NULL dtype=object e.g. Member; Inactive; President; Vice President; Treasurer; Secretary
member.t_shirt_size: description: column_description=The size of tee shirt that member wants when shirts are ordered; value_description=commonsense evidence: usually the student ordered t-shirt with lager size has bigger body shape  dtype=object e.g. Medium; X-Large; Large; Small
member.phone: description: column_description=The best telephone at which to contact the member; value_description=NULL dtype=object e.g. 454-555-7970; 403-555-1310; 905-555-5035; 951-555-6777; 738-555-2267; 942-555-1132
member.zip: description: column_description=the zip code of the member's hometown; value_description=NULL dtype=int64 e.g. 48236; 55108; 35640; 1020; 7080; 79106
member.link_to_major: description: column_description=The unique identifier of the major of the member. References the Major table; value_description=NULL dtype=object e.g. recxRBSgVYeSEGvyo; rec9CqGCGV8Y8rOSY; rec09LedkREyskCNv; rec7BxKpjJ7bNph3O; recVNDNQrJxsXPFXa; recaJdSK83k6ekRJL

major.major_id: description: column_description=A unique identifier for each major; value_description=NULL dtype=object e.g. recVeoVlIsO6k6iUM; recz2waxrgL2KJEHe; recr0WVEPZ08hl4Wt; recdem96jNnpiXfsH; recsI2B6p1FUQtTlq; rec8UcO67UAV7r4dm
major.major_name: description: column_description=major name; value_description=NULL dtype=object e.g. Music; Agricultural Communication; Wildlife Ecology and Management; Accounting; Aerospace Studies; Art History
major.department: description: column_description=The name of the department that offers the major; value_description=NULL dtype=object e.g. School of Applied Sciences, Technology and Education
major.college: description: column_description=The name college that houses the department that offers the major; value_description=NULL dtype=object e.g. College of the Arts; School of Business; College of Science; College of Agriculture and Applied Sciences; College of Education & Human Services; College of Natural Resources

process.params: member_join;;{major_name} is associated with the Technology industry

process.Thought: Now that I have the joined table, I need to filter for majors that are related to the Technology industry. Since this requires semantic understanding of what constitutes a 'Technology' major, I'll use the 'sem_filter' operator.

With the filtered table containing only members associated with Technology-related majors, I now need to count how many members are in this filtered table. I'll use the 'agg' operator with the count function on the 'member_id' column.
